name: Cheery Cherries
description:
*As Seen In The Beading Daily Blog*
http://beadingdaily.com

My version of the now classic cherries on stem earrings!

Juicy Red Glass Beads dangle and shine on 2 tiered dangles, accented by Fresh Green Glass Leaf Beads.

Longest dangle measures 1.5 inch, and SP surgical Steel Ear Wires.

name: Die, Die My Darling - White
description:
If you want it, come and get it ;)

Remember playing Dungeons & Dragons?

Do you still play on Saturday night?

Do you wish you were playing right now?

Then this pendant is for you!

This is the 20 sided dice from the dice set. This Dice is Opaque White with Bright Red numbers. Great for a Guy or a Girl :)

Absolutely stunning!

The wires in the dice are set with super strong 2,500 PSI epoxy! I put a bit on the top of the die as well as inside the hole, and wrap the loop up tight. This helps to keep the die secure on the wire and makes them super durable.

Great for Geeks.

Great for Posers.

Just freakin' great.

SP wire, SP clasp, Jump, and Split rings. Faux leather cord measures 20 inches.

FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING ON ALL ORDERS!

*****************************
PAYMENT, SHIPPING & HANDLING
*****************************

Please select payment method “PayPal” to pay via PayPal, Credit Card, or to send funds from your bank account. No need to sign up for a PayPal account.

Please select payment method "Other" if you wish to pay via Google Checkout or Revolution Money Exchange (RME).

All Items come packaged in a Zip-Top Bag, with bubble wrap. Gift boxes available on request for an additional fee.

Domestic Shipping is USPS First Class Mail with Delivery Confirmation. International Shipments are sent First Class International.

I will do my best to ship the next business day, however in rare cases, it may take up to 3 business days to ship your order.

Insurance is available on request at buyers’ expense. (Subject to availability outside the US) Please let me know if you would like to add it or require another shipping method.

Please do not hesitate to click on “contact” to send me a message if you require more information. I will reply as soon as possible.

name: Arsenic
description:
Little squares of frosted plastic with the atomic symbol for "Arsenic" printed on them in black ink.

Morbid, but adorable.

Charms measure .5 inch by just under .5 inch.

Silver Plate Surgical Steel ear wires.

name: Smoking Roses
description:
A stack of rose quartz and smokey quartz, wrapped up in handmade-by-me fine silver headpins.

It all hangs from handmade-by-me sterling silver ear wires.

Dangles measure 1 inch/ 2.54 cm. hook style earrings include rubber ear wire stoppers.

name: Heirloom
description:
Tiny lamp work glass beads, in shades of gray and yellow, wrapped in sterling and fine silver and hung from handmade by me sterling silver ear wires.

All the silver is oxidized to a matte charcoal gray patina.

The dangles measure 1.25 inch/ 3.18 cm. Earrings Include Rubber Ear Wire Stopper/Clutches.
